data.title: Prototype
data.meta_description: AFEELA - Mobility that people can feel as an intelligent entity. Mobility that can feel people and society through new technology. To create and nurture this new relationship. At AFEELA, the evolution has already begun.
data.text:
Video cannot be played.

Comfortable Boarding and Departure â Always Seamless

As you approach the car, it recognizes you with ultra-wideband (UWB) sensors and cameras, greets you with a light, and opens its doors for you. Once inside, it authenticates you* as the driver, and a friendly welcome screen appears and prepares your destination and route map on a panoramic display. Shift to Drive, and you're ready to go â intuitive activation, bypassing the traditional start button.

* Pre-registration for authentication is required

Video cannot be played.

Exceptional Drive Feel in a Precise and Supportive Mobility Companion

AFEELA instills a deep sense of confidence as its intelligent mobility oversees your journey. Its many integrated sensors provide continuous traffic monitoring, subtly supporting your every move. On unfamiliar roads or complex urban environments, AFEELA empowers you â your vigilant partner, delivering safety and peace of mind. Enjoy confidence and reliability with freedom behind the wheel like never before.

Video cannot be played.

Automated Parking. Smart Even After You Leave the Vehicle

Arrive with no worries. AFEELA finds your parking place and parks itself. Itâs that easy, reducing all the hassles of searching for a space and parking. Enjoy the exhilaration of driving without compromising.

Sensors and Cameras at All Angles â 360° Vigilance

AFEELA boasts sensors and cameras inside and out, monitoring 360°. It tirelessly watching traffic conditions, and based on the high precision data acquired, provides natural and optimal driving assistance. These sensors and cameras also double up for user authentication and 3D display on navigation screen.

Evolving Accuracy of Assisted Driving By the Use of Image Recognition AI

The role of AI is to recognize the image captured by the sensor and take appropriate action. In the future, the use of AI along with sensors will greatly affect the performance of driver assistance. AI used for AFEELA applies the machine learning technologies, including Transformer models, to both perception and planning. It also actively uses Vision Transformer (ViT), excelling AFEELA in capturing and detecting characteristics in a broader perspective, to accommodate exceptional sensor performance and realize effective action planning. Depending on the application, through the hybrid approach such as combining with convolutional neural networks (CNN), we aim to deliver flexible, high-precision driving assistance.

Advanced Driving Assistance enabled by Next-Gen Computing Performance

Partnering with Qualcomm Technologies, a leading semiconductor company, Sony Honda Mobility adopted the Snapdragon Ride™ Platform's SoC*1 to power intelligent mobility with computational performance of up to 800 TOPS*2 Together, we've maximized the platform's performance to achieve advanced Level 2/2+ driving assistance under a wider range of driving conditions, potentially reaching Level 3 autonomous driving under certain conditions. This high computational performance not only contributes to driver assistance but also aids in software updates or enhanced entertainment via 3D displays that optimize sensing data.

*1 TOPSï¼Tera Operation Per Second*2 SoCï¼System on a Chip

Synchronized Sense of People and Mobility: High Precision Hardware

Mobility that anticipates needs and compliments the driverâs every move delivers a sense of security and the exhilaration of seamless control. To achieve this, craftsmanship and impeccable hardware integration are the key. AFEELA delivers driving performance that bends to your will with meticulously refined components such as its body and suspension. Also, the cabin environment provides consistent comfort under all road conditions, dampening vibrations and offering a tranquil and relaxing experience. Combined with AFEELAâs driving assistance features, this vehicle responds to your every whim, speaking to the security and trust provided by intelligent mobility.

Stay Ahead with the Latest Software Updates

AFEELA: More than just a mobility device. It's an advanced system connected to a network that updates its software. Enjoy functional enhancements and optimized driving performance that always keep your car up-to-date. The ever-evolving AFEELA is always captivating, while it maximizes software potential to elevate mobility, freedom, and enjoyment.
